text: Szabolcs Szegletes (born 19 July 1978) is a Hungarian footballer who played for BVSC Budapest as striker. ==References== * Futballévkönyv 1999 [Football Yearbook 1999], Volume I, pp. 78–82., Aréna 2000 kiadó, Budapest, 2000 Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Hungarian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Budapesti VSC footballers
title: Szabolcs Szegletes
